name: Wolf Pack
stunts: Pack Tactics: For each additional wolf beyond the first, the pack gains +1 to create an advantage or overcome when acting together (max +3)
Howling Dread: Once per scene, the pack's howls impose a temporary aspect "Instinctual Fear" on prey

stress.notes: Treat each stress box as one wolf taken out (e.g., a pack of 2 wolves has 2 stress boxes)
